titles: Sparkles of glory, or Some beams of the morning-star. Wherein are many discoveries as to truth, and peace. To the establishment, and pure enlargement of a Christian in spirit and truth. / By John Saltmarsh. Preacher of the Gospell.
author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.
publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spred-Eagle, at the West end of Pauls,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Christianity --  Essence, genius, nature --  Early works to 1800.
